items.content_html: This Tic-Tac-Toe game is a fun, interactive web-based implementation of the classic two-player strategy game. Built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it’s lightweight, responsive, and simple to play, making it perfect for showcasing your coding skills or having a quick match with friends.
items.title: KuldeepLakum/TicTakToy: This Tic-Tac-Toe game is a fun, interactive web-based implementation of the classic two-player strategy game. Built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it’s lightweight, responsive, and simple to play, making it perfect for showcasing your coding skills or having a quick match with friends.

items.content_html: A lightweight Database GUI in your browser. It supports connecting to Postgres, MySQL, and SQLite.
items.title: outerbase/studio: A lightweight Database GUI in your browser. It supports connecting to Postgres, MySQL, and SQLite.

items.content_html: NanoService is an open-source framework that enables developers to build lightweight, modular, and scalable backend applications using nanoservices.
items.title: deskree-inc/nanoservice-ts: NanoService is an open-source framework that enables developers to build lightweight, modular, and scalable backend applications using nanoservices.

items.content_html: Lightweight Android app in React-Native to separate data, images, and videos into annotation groups and send them to back-end cloud servers for further AI analysis.

items.content_html: A lightweight animation library featuring JavaScript scroll animations powered by GSAP and a complementary CSS-only animation system. Add beautiful scroll-triggered or instant animations to any element using simple data attributes. Perfect for Webflow projects and custom websites.
items.title: austin-thesing/quick-web-animations: A lightweight animation library featuring JavaScript scroll animations powered by GSAP and a complementary CSS-only animation system. Add beautiful scroll-triggered or instant animations to any element using simple data attributes. Perfect for Webflow projects and custom websites.
